sentences.en: At least we now have 4 people averaging double digIt'scoring.
sentences.cn: 至少我们现在知道有4个人平均得分上双了.

sentences.en: Averaging also can conceal variations in the different portions of the sample.
sentences.cn: 平均法也会隐藏样品不同部分的差异性.

sentences.en: Averaging it out between us there's less than £10 a month each to live on.
sentences.cn: 咱俩把这笔钱平均分一下，每人每月的生活费还不到10英镑。

sentences.en: Averaging produces a smoother plot and reveals a longer - term trend of Force Index.
sentences.cn: 平均的方法可以提供平缓的图,利用力量指数反映 长期 的趋势.

sentences.en: Data averaging and data smoothing technique efficiently improve the ratio of signal to noise.
sentences.cn: 用累加平均和数字平滑技术提高了信噪比.

sentences.en: Evidently, this will not be the case if the averaging period is very short.
sentences.cn: 显然, 如果用于平均的周期非常短,那情况就不会如此了.

sentences.en: I've done some averaging to reach these figures.
sentences.cn: 我平均以后得出这些数.

sentences.en: Other than Yao and McGrady, the Rockets are averaging a combined 30 points.
sentences.cn: 除了姚明和麦迪, 火箭其他球员场均共得30分.

sentences.en: Second - year forwards Durant and Jeff Green are averaging 26 points and 17.1 points , respectively.
sentences.cn: 二年级前锋杜兰特和格林场均分别得到26分和17.1分.

sentences.en: Some critics regard dollar - cost averaging, or automatically investing a fixed amount every month, as foolish.
sentences.cn: 一些批评人士甚至认为平均成本投资(每个月自动投资固定金额)是种愚蠢的做法.

sentences.en: Some methods for averaging incrementally increasing quantities are introduced and analysed briefly for each of them.
sentences.cn: 介绍了求递增量平均值的几种方法,并对每种方法特征做了简单分析.

sentences.en: Take the average of those ratios and multiply by a hundred.
sentences.cn: 取那些比例的平均数再乘以100。

sentences.en: The average price of goods rose by just 2.2%.
sentences.cn: 商品的平均价格仅上涨了2.2%。

sentences.en: The interpreter was averaging about 60 % accuracy in rendering the American's comments into Chinese.
sentences.cn: 在把美方发言人的发言翻译成中文的过程中,译员的平均准确率大概有60%.

sentences.en: The occupancy rate of beds has been averaging out about 80 percent.
sentences.cn: 病床占用率平均保持在80%左右.

sentences.en: The Qinghai - Tibet Plateau is the world's highest plateau, averaging over 4000 metres above sea level and covering an area of 200,000 square kilometres.
sentences.cn: 中国的 青藏 高原是世界最高的高原.平均高度在海拔4000米以上,面积达20万平方公里.

sentences.en: We may get something in total, but averaging it out, each of us will get only next to nothing.
sentences.cn: 总起来讲,我们能得到一些, 但平均起来每个人几乎一无所得.

phrases.tran_cn: 平均算子；求平均数算子

trans.tran_cn: 拉平价格，为取得更高的平均价格而买进[卖出]，求平均值
trans.tran_en: An average is the result that you get when you add two or more numbers together and divide the total by the number of numbers you added together
To average a particular amount means to do, get, or produce that amount as an average over a period of time
